report.title: Fuzzy Sedation
report.author: Ineada Bongit
report.bodytext: Subject Specs /n /n Healthy teen male /n weight- 125 lbs /n height- 5' 9' /n /n /n /n Ambien/Skullcap /n /n T-0:00- One bowl of skullcap smoked. /n /n T+0:05- Took 5mg of ambien, slight effects from skullcap noticable. /n /n T+0:10- Feeling quite wavy, but that is a normal effect from skullcap. /n /n T + 0:23 - Not really much different effects, just sort of a wavyness, felling sort of tired. /n /n T + 0:32 - Feeling very very spacey and very very tired, I got very frightened by a commercial for a scary movie. Also forgot to mention that I did a shot of straight gin about 30 minutes before the initial dosing. Considering going to sleep, school in the morning. /n /n T + 0:40 - Feel very happy, not as tired. I'm putting a movie on and laying down. Typing is somewhat of a challange. /n /n T + 1:00 -I seem to be coming down already, I'm still as tired as I was, but there is no more happyness or wavy feelings. /n /n I think that Ambien could be a wonderful drug to experiment with, but I don't think my dose was quite high enough, or maybe the skullcap or alcholol interfeared with the effects.
